artist: Artist: José Guadalupe Posada; Publisher: La Estampa Mexicana, Mexico; Printer: Taller de Grafica Popular, Mexico City
creditline: Gift of Lisa and David Erickson
description: couple seated in a small old car with white tires, seen from PR side, with decorative scrolls around edges of image; text at top and bottom: "EL AUTOMOVIL / NUEVA COLECCION DE CANCIONES / PARA EL / PRESENTE / ANO. / RECOPILADAS / por / A. VANEGAS ARROYO. / MEXICO."
portfolio: From 25 Prints of Jose Guadalupe Posada
provenance: Lisa and David Erickson, Minneapolis; given to Mia, 2017
title: El Automóvil (The Automobile), plate 24 from "25 Prints of Jose Guadalupe Posada"
